last_episode_to_air.name: The Gardener
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the gang finally get close to the heart of Red Rose, they face a dilemma they could never have imagined. How much more will they have to sacrifice to destroy it? And to what extent will they triumph over, or succumb to, their own personal demons? Can something like Red Rose truly be destroyed…?

name: Red Rose
overview: When one of a group of friends downloads the mysterious Red Rose app, plans change. What starts innocently as a game of admiration rapidly descends into something much darker.
tagline: It's not just your battery that could die

episodes.name: It's Grim Up North
episodes.overview: Summer stretches out in front of a group of teenage mates from Bolton. But when one of them downloads a mysterious app called Red Rose, their plans change.

episodes.name: The Garden
episodes.overview: Red Rose digs deeper, manipulating and isolating, demonstrating its power.

episodes.name: Scapegoat
episodes.overview: It feels like history is repeating itself. But how do you resist something when it’s turning not only your friends but the town itself against you?

episodes.name: Manchester Innit
episodes.overview: Away from Bolton, the friends are surprised by what they find. But the more they understand, the wider Red Rose casts its net.

episodes.name: Lockdown
episodes.overview: Time is running out, so the gang change tack. Red Rose has other plans – and shows them there’s no escape.

episodes.name: Results Day
episodes.overview: Dawn turns to dusk, as secrets threaten to shatter an already fractured group, pushed to the limit.

episodes.name: I Heart BLTN
episodes.overview: The endgame is in sight, but together or apart, they’re all under threat.

episodes.name: The Gardener
episodes.overview: As the gang finally get close to the heart of Red Rose, they face a dilemma they could never have imagined. How much more will they have to sacrifice to destroy it? And to what extent will they triumph over, or succumb to, their own personal demons? Can something like Red Rose truly be destroyed…?
